import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Axios from "axios"; function Book(){ const [checkIn,setCheckIn]=useState(""); const [checkout,setCheckout]=useState(""); const [nop,setnop]=useState(""); const [nopf,setnopf]=useState(""); useEffect(function(){ Axios.get('http://localhost:3001/Book').then((Response)=>{ console.log(Response); setCheckIn(Response.data[0]); setCheckout(Response.data[1]); setnop(Response.data[2]); }); }) function handleNameChange(event) { this.setnop({nop: event.target.value}); } return(
